resources.string: (・ω・)ノHi ~ I’m your AI helper for blocking all the notifications when you are busy. If someone contacts you through message, I will automatically reply them. Other notifications will be ignored. To work properly, please open up all of the necessary permissions. If you want personalized reply message, please go to settings. It’s important to notice that it takes about 10 to 15 seconds to make all of the services connected when you launch this app, please wait until "System Ready!" pops up. Finally, Wish you a happy study life! o(*°▽°*)o
By the way, your default username is Master, which is used in auto replying~
